content: If you are an American citizen and you are so stupid that you don’t know how to get a photo ID you are definitely too stupid to be voting. Serious issues are decided in elections. If you can’t understand how to get a photo ID you definitely won’t be able to get a handle on a serious political issue. No birth certificate? Every state has a low cost procedure to grant birth certificates to those who legitimately don’t have one. There is no excuse.
